com.experian.aperture.datastudio.sdk.step

Class StepConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.experian.aperture.datastudio.sdk.step.StepConfiguration

  • public abstract class StepConfiguration
extends Object
    Metadata class that defines a step. To be used by 3rd party developers.

        protected void setStepDefinitionDescription(String stepDefinitionDescription)
        Set the step's description. Is displayed in the UI under the step name.
        Parameters:
        stepDefinitionDescription - Step description

      • getStepDefinitionDescription

        public String getStepDefinitionDescription()
        Get the step's description. Is displayed in the UI under the step name.
        Returns:
        Step description

      • setStepDefinitionIcon

        protected void setStepDefinitionIcon(String stepDefinitionIcon)
        Set the step's icon. It is displayed in the UI alongside the step name. Icons are currently referred to by strings as we cannot (yet) expose the iconType class. Icon names will be provided.
        Parameters:
        stepDefinitionIcon - Step's icon name

      • getStepDefinitionIcon

        public String getStepDefinitionIcon()
        Get the step's icon. It is displayed in the UI alongside the step name. Icons are currently referred to by strings as we cannot (yet) expose the iconType class. Icon names will be provided.
        Returns:
        Step's icon name

      • setStepOutput

        protected void setStepOutput(StepOutput stepOutput)
        Set the step associated with the definition, must be created new and set as part of the definition.
        Parameters:
        stepOutput - step output class

      • getStepOutput

        public StepOutput getStepOutput()
        Get the step associated with the definition.
        Returns:
        step output class

      • getStepProperties

        public List<StepProperty> getStepProperties()
        Gets the composite properties that define the UI components associate with the view
        Returns:
        A list of step properties

        Sets the composite properties that define the UI components associated with the view
        Parameters:
        stepProperties - step properties class

      • clearStepProperties

        protected void clearStepProperties()
        Clear the step properties

      • isComplete

        public Boolean isComplete()
        Function to indicate whether or not the view is 'complete', in other words has a valid definition and can be executed. This should be overridden by custom steps to implement their own validation. if false will not be able to execute/export/show data
        Returns:
        false - will not be able to execute/export/show data, true - will be able to execute/export/show data, null - will revert back to default behaviour, i.e. enabled if step has inputs, and are they complete?

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Function to indicate whether or not the step is visible to the user. This should be overridden by custom steps to implement their own validation. if false the function will not appear in the list of steps in the editor
        Returns:
        false - will not be able to see the step, true - will be able to see the step

      • log

        public void log(String message)
        Logs a message to the Aperture log file
        Parameters:
        message - - the message to log

      • logError

        public void logError(String error)
        Logs an error message to the Aperture log
        Parameters:
        error - - the message to log

      • setTranslateFunction

        public final void setTranslateFunction(Function<String,String> translateFunction)
        Sets the translate function. Should be called internally only.
        Parameters:
        translateFunction - Function that is used to get internationalised text from Aperture

      • translateText

        public final String translateText(String key)
        Translates a string key to the internationalised display string. For internal use only.
        Parameters:
        key - - the key to lookup in the string table
        Returns:
        the translated string

      • setServerProperty

        public final void setServerProperty(Function<String,Object> getServerProperty)
        Sets the translate function. Should be called internally only.
        Parameters:
        getServerProperty - Function that is used to get an Aperture server property

      • getServerProperty

        public final String getServerProperty(String propertyName)
        Get the server property value for the given property name
        Parameters:
        propertyName - - the name of the property
        Returns:
        - the value of the property or null if not found

      • getDescriptionForDocument

        public String getDescriptionForDocument()
        Allows the step to optionally define its operation for display in the workflow report.
        Returns:
        The description as a string, with linefeed characters for line breaks.
